name: pump-landing
description: Pump.fun Landing Page with dynamic token loading

scripts.obfuscate:full: javascript-obfuscator js/app.js --output js/app.obf.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-encoding base64 --self-defending true && javascript-obfuscator js/token-loader.js --output js/token-loader.obf.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-encoding base64 --self-defending true
